title: Murray River Award-Winning Lakeside Escape near Black Bull Golf Course with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Surrounded by river red gums and Lake Mulwala’s gentle waters, award-winning lakeside luxury awaits on the south bank of the Murray River. Every element has been carefully handpicked to complement the region’s otherworldly bushland beauty - swim, boat or fish the day away before returning to the resort's Stock & Barrel restaurant for country-inspired plates and handpicked spirits or Elizabeth's for pared-back fine dining with a uniquely Yarrawonga twist.

Slip into a sunchair by the resort’s heated infinity Sunset pool and watch as the sun falls beneath Lake Mulwala’s ghostly, sunken eucalyptus trees, igniting the horizon in a blaze of colour as evening descends - it’s an experience that can't be missed. Those who golf together will adore the Black Bull 18-hole championship golf course - consistently rated one of the country’s best - while a trip to SOL Wellness, offering holistic treatments drawing on foraged Australian active ingredients, is highly recommended.

title: Murray River Award-Winning Lakeside Escape with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Welcome Hamper

Those who golf together will adore the Black Bull 18-hole championship golf course - consistently rated one of the country’s best - while a trip to SOL Wellness, offering holistic treatments drawing on foraged Australian active ingredients, is highly recommended.
